LanguageData.Ship_Beam.label: ship structural beam
LanguageData.Ship_Beam.description: A structural beam around which a starship can be constructed. Includes all the necessary conduits and transit pipes for communications, power, and materials transport.
LanguageData.Ship_Beam_Blueprint.label: ship structural beam (blueprint)
LanguageData.Ship_Beam_Frame.label: ship structural beam (building)
LanguageData.Ship_Beam_Frame.description: A structural beam around which a starship can be constructed. Includes all the necessary conduits and transit pipes for communications, power, and materials transport.
LanguageData.Ship_CryptosleepCasket.label: ship cryptosleep casket
LanguageData.Ship_CryptosleepCasket.description: A cryptosleep casket hardened against the dangers of space. Capable of maintaining a person in cryptosleep for centuries and surviving atmospheric re-entry.
LanguageData.Ship_CryptosleepCasket_Blueprint.label: ship cryptosleep casket (blueprint)
LanguageData.Ship_CryptosleepCasket_Frame.label: ship cryptosleep casket (building)
LanguageData.Ship_CryptosleepCasket_Frame.description: A cryptosleep casket hardened against the dangers of space. Capable of maintaining a person in cryptosleep for centuries and surviving atmospheric re-entry.
LanguageData.Ship_ComputerCore.label: ship computer core
LanguageData.Ship_ComputerCore.description: A computer core housing an AI persona who can guide a starship through any challenge during a multi-decade starflight.
LanguageData.Ship_ComputerCore_Blueprint.label: ship computer core (blueprint)
LanguageData.Ship_ComputerCore_Frame.label: ship computer core (building)
LanguageData.Ship_ComputerCore_Frame.description: A computer core housing an AI persona who can guide a starship through any challenge during a multi-decade starflight.
LanguageData.Ship_Reactor.label: ship reactor
LanguageData.Ship_Reactor.description: Powers a ship on its journey between stars. Takeoff requires a long powerup process that is likely to attract raiders.
LanguageData.Ship_Reactor_Blueprint.label: ship reactor (blueprint)
LanguageData.Ship_Reactor_Frame.label: ship reactor (building)
LanguageData.Ship_Reactor_Frame.description: Powers a ship on its journey between stars. Takeoff requires a long powerup process that is likely to attract raiders.
LanguageData.Ship_Engine.label: ship engine
LanguageData.Ship_Engine.description: A reactionless Johnson-Tanaka drive capable of launching a ship into orbit, and crawling across the vast expanses between stars.
LanguageData.Ship_Engine_Blueprint.label: ship engine (blueprint)
LanguageData.Ship_Engine_Frame.label: ship engine (building)
LanguageData.Ship_Engine_Frame.description: A reactionless Johnson-Tanaka drive capable of launching a ship into orbit, and crawling across the vast expanses between stars.
LanguageData.Ship_SensorCluster.label: sensor cluster
LanguageData.Ship_SensorCluster.description: A multi-function sensor module. Can scan and signal across the void for communications, threat detection, deception, jamming, and other purposes.
LanguageData.Ship_SensorCluster_Blueprint.label: sensor cluster (blueprint)
LanguageData.Ship_SensorCluster_Frame.label: sensor cluster (building)
LanguageData.Ship_SensorCluster_Frame.description: A multi-function sensor module. Can scan and signal across the void for communications, threat detection, deception, jamming, and other purposes.
